name: A Grim Reunion
description:
Description:
You're a grim reaper child at a family reunion. It's about time to leave and your goal is to say good-bye to the rest of the family by hugging them.

It's a short vertical slice made in about 4 weeks.
An affection game, or as we like to call it, a hug simulator.

Group: Dopey Dog
Justin Kuo: main programmer
David Iacono: producer & secondary programmer
San Nguyen: sound
Anna Kalandyk: artist

Project restrictions:
-limited to approximately 60 seconds of gameplay
-not a dating sim
-think about affection, make an affection game

Character stickers can be found at:
https://www.redbubble.com/shop/a+grim+reunion
